Sweet Dreams

Joe Nicholas

I have these dreams where a fungus takes over all of our minds. You know you're doomed when you smell strawberry shortcake. Within minutes it bursts through your eyes. By then you can't feel it, but you still have an idea of what's happening. And that stays, although the idea slowly changes to one simple notion: expand.
